lead_paragraph: Tomas Tatar scored with 2 minutes 50 seconds left in the third period to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 4-3 win over the Sabres in Buffalo.
snippet: Tomas Tatar scored with 2 minutes 50 seconds left in the third period to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 4-3 win over the Sabres in Buffalo.

headline.main: Late Goal Lifts Red Wings Over Sabres
headline.print_headline: Late Goal Lifts Red Wings Over Sabres
